document_data.mainbody:
Edmund Kincaid was King of Snowdown in the Moonshae Isles during the turn of the 6 century DR. He was subsequently named as regent of Callidyrr as well.
In the , after High King Tuathal and High King Carrig III were both assassinated in quick succession, Edmund Kincaid was appointed as regent to the throne of High King by Carrig IIIs wife, Queen Abigail. Edmund held this position until Carrig IIIs heir, Colin Cymrych, tuned fifteen in the .
